title: The Hound of the Baskervilles: A Sherlock Holmes Graphic Novel
description: After the success of their Illustrated Classics version of The Picture of Dorian Gray, Ian Edginton and I.N.J. Culbard have teamed up again to create a visually compelling graphic novel adaptation of Arthur Conan DoyleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s masterpiece. All the elements are here for a thrilling tale: A gnarled walking stick, missing boot, neglected family portrait, convicted killer on the loose, and the ancestral curse of a phantom hound.
